import os
import numpy as np 
import pandas as pd 
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
source.bcf3d4df:
for dirname, _, filenames in os.walk('/kaggle/input'):
    for filename in filenames:
        path = os.path.join(dirname, filename)
        
        

data = pd.read_csv(
    path,
    header=None,
    skip_blank_lines=True,
    sep='[: ]',
    index_col=False,
    engine='python')

plt.title("Target distribution")

att_6 = data.iloc[:, 6]
att_5.hist(histtype='stepfilled', bins=5)

source.bc92eca6:
countx, divisionx = np.histogram(att_5, normed=True)
county, divisiony = np.histogram(att_6, normed=True)
val = [(divisionx[i] + divisionx[i + 1]) / 2
       for i in range(len(divisionx) - 1)]
plt.plot(val , countx - county , 'o-')
plt.title("Difference plot")
